content.content: A round of events and happenings on the gitcoin forum globally 2022 was unique with all - grants, hackathon and appendatures. A new update on the highlights / hackathon, kudos to the team members developer @MoonbeamNetwork 2/ The following are the winning submissions per bounty from each hackathon sponsor. A big as we heard on tweets @Hyperlane_xyz , @axelarcore , @LayerZero_Labs , & @wormholecrypto , for making this event possible, and to @gitcoin for hosting I am glad once more to get on along with the frontier of the Learned worth grants collection and appendatures on the gitcoin platform. Thank you for the opportunity to be a part of this’ #2023 is here’ cheers  to all as we get connected in all schedules. @free2ride19
